title: The Favorites - NFL Conference Championship Best Bets
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Conference Championship Best Bets
description:
The dizzying highs and terrifying lows of another NFL season are drawing to a close, and Chad Millman of the Action Network once again welcomes pro bettor Simon Hunter to discuss all things betting across two premiere NFL playoff matchups this weekend as they narrow down their favorite bets.

Together they finish their review of the Cincinnati Bengals visiting Arrowhead to take on the Kansas City Chiefs, and ultimately disagree on the best way to approach gambling on the game. Later they wrap up their San Francisco 49ers vs. Los Angeles Rams debate, agreeing on a side to bet in the late game. With the Super Bowl looming, now is the best time to buckle down, focus up and get your most informed bets of the season in before the yawning chasm of the NFL offseason swallows the sports world whole. So let's go out with a bang, and good luck this weekend!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
